description:

原文：

Clare：I cannot believe you got a dog without consulting me.This was a major family decision.
Phil:It was wrong.
Clare:Yeah.
Phil:And I’m sorry.But we have talked about getting a dog for years.And you’re the only one who wasn’t into it.
Clare:Because I knew that I would be the one taking care of it.
Phil:That’s not true.No.we will all help.This is a great chance to teach the kids responsibility.
Clare:That is exactly what you said about Luke’s paper route.

title: 美剧天天秀: 摩登家庭 S01E21

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：曲值

30秒音频：

模仿文本：Some birds died after colliding with solar equipment which the animals mistake for water. Other birds were killed or suffered burns after flying through the intense heat at the solar thermal plant. As solar projects increase, environmentalists and developers are considering what to do to reduce bird death.

译文：一些鸟儿撞死在被它们误认为是水源的太阳能设备上。另外一些又被太阳能发电站上空的高温蒸汽（参见上一期节目的发电原理其蒸汽超过260摄氏度）灼伤或烫死。随着太阳能工程的日益增多，环保主义者和项目开发者也在考虑怎样才能减少鸟类死亡事件的发生。

小编模仿：

单词细节：

af·ter adverb \ˈaf-tər\
col·lide intransitive verb \kə-ˈlīd\
an·i·mal noun \ˈa-nə-məl\
mis·take verb \mə-ˈstāk\
wa·ter noun, often attributive \ˈwȯ-tər, ˈwä-\
through preposition \ˈthrü\
in·tense adjective \in-ˈten(t)s\
ther·mal adjective \ˈthər-məl\
plant verb \ˈplant\
proj·ect noun \ˈprä-ˌjekt, -jikt also ˈprō-\
en·vi·ron·men·tal·ist noun \in-ˈvī-rə(n)-mən-tə-ləst\
de·vel·op·er noun \-lə-pər\
re·duce verb \ri-ˈdüs, -ˈdyüs\

20秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： "I think a lot of people link it to their identity that a selfie is capturing something that they can show to the world that represents themselves." Nathaniel Herr, a psychology professor at American University in Washington, explains why the younger generation, in particular, is taking and posting selfies.
"They're more comfortable with seeing themselves and thinking about themselves than previous generations were."“很多人将它和自我联系在一起，认为自拍可以将自己展示给世界。”纳撒尼尔·赫尔是美利坚大学的心理学教授。他解释了许多人，特别是年轻一代，喜欢自拍和晒照的原因 。
“跟前人相比，他们这一代更能坦然地面对和思考自我。”

title: 世人皆爱玩自拍(1/2)

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于伊斯兰国害的一名美国女性人质丧生的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：
伊斯兰恐怖组织最近越来越猖狂啦，前几天才烧死个人，这几天又开始生事端了。。。
跟别国反恐组织掐架，结果害的一名人质丧生。
CONTENT：
(Reuters) - Islamic State said on Friday that an American woman hostage it was holding in Syria was killed when Jordanian fighter jets bombed a building where she was being held, but Jordan expressed doubt about the Islamist militant group's account of her death.
In Washington, U.S. officials said they could not confirm that the woman, 26-year-old humanitarian worker Kayla Mueller of Prescott, Arizona, had been killed.
Mueller was the last-known American hostage held by Islamic State, which controls wide areas of Syria and Iraq.
The group has beheaded three other Americans, two Britons and two Japanese hostages - most of them aid workers or journalists - in recent months. Mueller was taken hostage while leaving a hospital in the northern Syrian city of Aleppo in August 2013.
KEY WORDS：
Islamic State                伊斯兰国
Jordanian                  约旦
fighter jets                  战斗机
account                     解释
humanitarian worker        人道主义工作者
Kayla Mueller               凯拉·穆勒
Prescott                    普莱斯考特
Arizona                    亚利桑那州
Behead                     斩首
Briton                      不列颠人
aid workers                 救援人员
Aleppo                      阿勒波
 
REFERENCE：http://www.reuters.com/article/2015/02/06/us-mideast-crisis-hostage-idUSKBN0LA1YQ20150206
 
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

（路透）- 伊斯兰国于周五宣称，一名美国女性人质在叙利亚关押期间，所在住所遭到约旦战斗机轰炸，并因此丧生。但是对伊斯兰军事组织给出的这种解释，约旦方面表示了质疑。
在华盛顿，美国官员则表示，他们还无法证实来自 普莱斯考特的26岁人道主义工作者凯拉·穆勒(是否)已经丧生。
伊斯兰国家控制了叙利亚和伊拉克的广大区域，而穆勒是所知被该国劫持的最后一名美国人质。
除穆勒之外，近几个月内该组织还斩首了另外三名美国人质，两名不列颠人质以及两名日本人质。他们中的大部分都是救援人员和记者。穆勒是于2013年8月份在离开谓语叙利亚北部阿勒波的一间医院时内被劫持的。

title: 英闻天天译: 伊斯兰国

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Corner
A corner is where two lines or two surfaces meet. What kind of corner is it? What happens at the corner?
This week's topic: The ran to the corner... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) a corner store which is open 24 hours everyday
2) children playing and running around, end up getting hurt when one child hits his or her head on the corner of a table
3) a race car diver rounded a sharp corner with great skills
4) a person decided to fight back with all the strength after being chased to a corner
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

“You probably have important projects yourself,” he said as he looked towards the pages on the table. The man followed Al's line of slight and smiled shyly. He has a great smile, Al thought to himself. Looking at his watch, he started to get up. Displaying his signature smile, he extended his hand once more, “It was nice meeting you.” The other man stood up as well, and shook his hand, indicating he felt the same. Without looking back, Al left. He was parked around the corner. When he got back inside his car, he took out his other phone and made a call.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

人物简介
瑞典国内少儿歌唱大赛冠军，16岁的甜妞Josefine Ridell
作品
以"Allt jag vill ha" (另一英文版歌名为：Reaching For The Stars)获得瑞典国内少儿歌唱大奖赛冠军，并将代表瑞典参加11月20日在白俄罗斯明斯克举办的2010欧洲少儿歌唱大赛（Junior Eurovision Song Contest）。

Josefine Ridell（出生于1997 年Oxie ，马尔默，瑞典）是一家瑞典的歌手，代表她的国家在初级欧洲电视网歌曲比赛2010年在她的歌"Allt Jag Vill Ha"（我想要的一切）由Thomas G:son， Arash，Robert Uhlmann， 和Johan Bejerholm创作。"Allt Jag Vill Ha"于2010年10月6日制作，10月25日发行。这首歌的MV是于2010年10月20日完成的。

That I can do everything I want to
I am reaching for the stars, no matter how far
I know someday I’ll make it through
I reach for the stars, I’ll find a way, no matter what it takes
I know someday my dreams come true
I reach for the stars

I know someday my dreams come true
I reach for the stars
…oh……oh……oh……

I know the road will be long but I keep moving on
‘Cause it is real, it’s my destiny,…oh…
I know that time will show, I’ll reach for the stars
I am reaching for the stars, no matter how far
I know someday I’ll make it through
I reach for the stars, I’ll find a way, no matter what it takes
I know someday my dreams come true
I reach for the stars,
ah……ah…oh……ah…oh……

I reach for the stars
ah……ah…oh……ah…oh……

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Reaching for the stars

description:
The films of Francois Ozon are a world away from the ones we've been discussing. They're often sultry, sexy, camp, melodramatic. Their aesthetic world bespeaks the chocolate box, the knicker drawer, the pool side. Ozon's 8 Women was an all-star murder mystery, his Angel, a freely adaptation, of an Elizabeth Taylor novel, his Under the Sand, a melancholy thriller full of adoring shots, of Charlotte Rampling. His new picture, In the House, is a work of comparative restraint, a black comedy of sorts about a school teacher who cultivates the literary talents of a young student, the student working on an autobiographical story about a cruel opportunistic friendship, with a classmate. The film critic Ginette Vincendeau has seen the film and is with me now.

Ginette, it's a bit of teaser this film, isn't it? The teacher and his wife played by Kristin Scott Thomas become almost addicted to this boy's story. But we never really know how much of it is true, do we?

No, but it, it's really a film about the power of storytelling, and the mystery of it, and we start from a very banal situation of, of a teacher setting an essay to students, saying, you know, write about your best, your best friend and what happens in his, his house. And then suddenly we're drawn into this extraordinary set of more and more lurid account, so what happens in this bourgeois household?
